original_text: Jesus had said, ‘I am the bread that came down from heaven.’ When he said this, the Jewish leaders there did not like it. So they started to say bad things about Jesus.
korean_text: 자기가 하늘에서 내려온 떡이라 하시므로 유대인들이 예수에 대하여 수군거려

sentences.original_text: the Jewish leaders there did not like it.
sentences.korean_translation: 거기에 있던 유대인 지도자들은 그것을 좋아하지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: So they started to say bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 나쁜 말을 하기 시작했다
